--Query--
SELECT * FROM BIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('00000000000',), ('11011000000',), ('01010101010',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT * FROM VARBIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('',), ('0',), ('010101',), ('01010101010',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT v, b, (v || b) AS concat        FROM BIT_TABLE, VARBIT_TABLE        ORDER BY 3
--Result--
[('', '00000000000', '00000000000'), ('0', '00000000000', '000000000000'), ('0', '01010101010', '001010101010'), ('010101', '00000000000', '01010100000000000'), ('', '01010101010', '01010101010'), ('01010101010', '00000000000', '0101010101000000000000'), ('01010101010', '01010101010', '0101010101001010101010'), ('010101', '01010101010', '01010101010101010'), ('01010101010', '11011000000', '0101010101011011000000'), ('010101', '11011000000', '01010111011000000'), ('0', '11011000000', '011011000000'), ('', '11011000000', '11011000000')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b, length(b) AS lb        FROM BIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('00000000000', 11), ('11011000000', 11), ('01010101010', 11)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT v, length(v) AS lv        FROM VARBIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('', 0), ('0', 1), ('010101', 6), ('01010101010', 11)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b,        SUBSTRING(b FROM 2 FOR 4) AS sub_2_4,        SUBSTRING(b FROM 7 FOR 13) AS sub_7_13,        SUBSTRING(b FROM 6) AS sub_6        FROM BIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('00000000000', '0000', '00000', '000000'), ('11011000000', '1011', '00000', '000000'), ('01010101010', '1010', '01010', '101010')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT v,        SUBSTRING(v FROM 2 FOR 4) AS sub_2_4,        SUBSTRING(v FROM 7 FOR 13) AS sub_7_13,        SUBSTRING(v FROM 6) AS sub_6        FROM VARBIT_TABLE
--Result--
[('', '', '', ''), ('0', '', '', ''), ('010101', '1010', '', '1'), ('01010101010', '1010', '01010', '101010')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT SUBSTRING('01010101'::bit(8) FROM 2 FOR 2147483646) AS "1010101"
--Result--
[('1010101',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT SUBSTRING('01010101'::bit(8) FROM -10 FOR 2147483646) AS "01010101"
--Result--
[('01010101',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT SUBSTRING('01010101'::varbit FROM 2 FOR 2147483646) AS "1010101"
--Result--
[('1010101',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT SUBSTRING('01010101'::varbit FROM -10 FOR 2147483646) AS "01010101"
--Result--
[('01010101',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT a,b,a<b AS "a<b",a<=b AS "a<=b",a=b AS "a=b",         a>=b AS "a>=b",a>b AS "a>b",a<>b AS "a<>b" FROM varbit_table
--Result--
[]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT a,a<<4 AS "a<<4",b,b>>2 AS "b>>2" FROM varbit_table
--Result--
[]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT a,b,a<b AS "a<b",a<=b AS "a<=b",a=b AS "a=b",         a>=b AS "a>=b",a>b AS "a>b",a<>b AS "a<>b" FROM bit_table
--Result--
[]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT a,a<<4 AS "a<<4",b,b>>2 AS "b>>2" FROM bit_table
--Result--
[]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT POSITION(B'1010' IN B'0000101')
--Result--
[(0,)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b, b >> 1 AS bsr, b << 1 AS bsl        FROM BIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('1101100000000000', '0110110000000000', '1011000000000000'), ('0110110000000000', '0011011000000000', '1101100000000000'), ('0011011000000000', '0001101100000000', '0110110000000000'), ('0001101100000000', '0000110110000000', '0011011000000000'), ('0000110110000000', '0000011011000000', '0001101100000000'), ('0000011011000000', '0000001101100000', '0000110110000000'), ('0000001101100000', '0000000110110000', '0000011011000000'), ('0000000110110000', '0000000011011000', '0000001101100000'), ('0000000011011000', '0000000001101100', '0000000110110000'), ('0000000001101100', '0000000000110110', '0000000011011000'), ('0000000000110110', '0000000000011011', '0000000001101100'), ('0000000000011011', '0000000000001101', '0000000000110110'), ('0000000000001101', '0000000000000110', '0000000000011010'), ('0000000000000110', '0000000000000011', '0000000000001100'), ('0000000000000011', '0000000000000001', '0000000000000110'), ('0000000000000001', '0000000000000000', '0000000000000010')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b, b >> 8 AS bsr8, b << 8 AS bsl8        FROM BIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('1101100000000000', '0000000011011000', '0000000000000000'), ('0110110000000000', '0000000001101100', '0000000000000000'), ('0011011000000000', '0000000000110110', '0000000000000000'), ('0001101100000000', '0000000000011011', '0000000000000000'), ('0000110110000000', '0000000000001101', '1000000000000000'), ('0000011011000000', '0000000000000110', '1100000000000000'), ('0000001101100000', '0000000000000011', '0110000000000000'), ('0000000110110000', '0000000000000001', '1011000000000000'), ('0000000011011000', '0000000000000000', '1101100000000000'), ('0000000001101100', '0000000000000000', '0110110000000000'), ('0000000000110110', '0000000000000000', '0011011000000000'), ('0000000000011011', '0000000000000000', '0001101100000000'), ('0000000000001101', '0000000000000000', '0000110100000000'), ('0000000000000110', '0000000000000000', '0000011000000000'), ('0000000000000011', '0000000000000000', '0000001100000000'), ('0000000000000001', '0000000000000000', '0000000100000000')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b::bit(15), b::bit(15) >> 1 AS bsr, b::bit(15) << 1 AS bsl        FROM BIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('110110000000000', '011011000000000', '101100000000000'), ('011011000000000', '001101100000000', '110110000000000'), ('001101100000000', '000110110000000', '011011000000000'), ('000110110000000', '000011011000000', '001101100000000'), ('000011011000000', '000001101100000', '000110110000000'), ('000001101100000', '000000110110000', '000011011000000'), ('000000110110000', '000000011011000', '000001101100000'), ('000000011011000', '000000001101100', '000000110110000'), ('000000001101100', '000000000110110', '000000011011000'), ('000000000110110', '000000000011011', '000000001101100'), ('000000000011011', '000000000001101', '000000000110110'), ('000000000001101', '000000000000110', '000000000011010'), ('000000000000110', '000000000000011', '000000000001100'), ('000000000000011', '000000000000001', '000000000000110'), ('000000000000001', '000000000000000', '000000000000010'), ('000000000000000', '000000000000000', '000000000000000')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT b::bit(15), b::bit(15) >> 8 AS bsr8, b::bit(15) << 8 AS bsl8        FROM BIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('110110000000000', '000000001101100', '000000000000000'), ('011011000000000', '000000000110110', '000000000000000'), ('001101100000000', '000000000011011', '000000000000000'), ('000110110000000', '000000000001101', '000000000000000'), ('000011011000000', '000000000000110', '100000000000000'), ('000001101100000', '000000000000011', '110000000000000'), ('000000110110000', '000000000000001', '011000000000000'), ('000000011011000', '000000000000000', '101100000000000'), ('000000001101100', '000000000000000', '110110000000000'), ('000000000110110', '000000000000000', '011011000000000'), ('000000000011011', '000000000000000', '001101100000000'), ('000000000001101', '000000000000000', '000110100000000'), ('000000000000110', '000000000000000', '000011000000000'), ('000000000000011', '000000000000000', '000001100000000'), ('000000000000001', '000000000000000', '000000100000000'), ('000000000000000', '000000000000000', '000000000000000')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT v, v >> 1 AS vsr, v << 1 AS vsl        FROM VARBIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('11011', '01101', '10110'), ('011011', '001101', '110110'), ('0011011', '0001101', '0110110'), ('00011011', '00001101', '00110110'), ('000011011', '000001101', '000110110'), ('0000011011', '0000001101', '0000110110'), ('00000011011', '00000001101', '00000110110'), ('000000011011', '000000001101', '000000110110'), ('0000000011011', '0000000001101', '0000000110110'), ('00000000011011', '00000000001101', '00000000110110'), ('000000000011011', '000000000001101', '000000000110110'), ('0000000000011011', '0000000000001101', '0000000000110110'), ('00000000000011011', '00000000000001101', '00000000000110110'), ('000000000000011011', '000000000000001101', '000000000000110110'), ('0000000000000011011', '0000000000000001101', '0000000000000110110'), ('00000000000000011011', '00000000000000001101', '00000000000000110110')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT v, v >> 8 AS vsr8, v << 8 AS vsl8        FROM VARBIT_SHIFT_TABLE
--Result--
[('11011', '00000', '00000'), ('011011', '000000', '000000'), ('0011011', '0000000', '0000000'), ('00011011', '00000000', '00000000'), ('000011011', '000000000', '100000000'), ('0000011011', '0000000000', '1100000000'), ('00000011011', '00000000000', '01100000000'), ('000000011011', '000000000000', '101100000000'), ('0000000011011', '0000000000000', '1101100000000'), ('00000000011011', '00000000000000', '01101100000000'), ('000000000011011', '000000000000000', '001101100000000'), ('0000000000011011', '0000000000000000', '0001101100000000'), ('00000000000011011', '00000000000000000', '00001101100000000'), ('000000000000011011', '000000000000000000', '000001101100000000'), ('0000000000000011011', '0000000000000000000', '0000001101100000000'), ('00000000000000011011', '00000000000000000000', '00000001101100000000')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT get_bit(B'0101011000100', 10)
--Result--
[(1,)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT set_bit(B'0101011000100100', 15, 1)
--Result--
[('0101011000100101',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT overlay(B'0101011100' placing '001' from 2 for 3)
--Result--
[('0001011100',)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT bit_count(B'0101011100'::bit(10))
--Result--
[(5,)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
TABLE bit_defaults
--Result--
[('1001', '0101', '1001', '0101')]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT pg_input_is_valid('01010001', 'bit(10)')
--Result--
[(False,)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT * FROM pg_input_error_info('01010001', 'bit(10)')
--Result--
[('bit string length 8 does not match type bit(10)', None, None, '22026')]
+--------------------+
